attributes.action: penalising students who want to pay back uni fees as quickly as possible
attributes.additional_details:
The government is now considering penalising students who can pay back there loans quickly, while a few rich uni grad's will be able to pay it back quickly i don't believe that people who want to pay back the debt quicker than others should suffer the same penalty.
We need 100,000 votes to have this proposal at least debated if not stopped all together. i think suffering between £21,000-£50,000 is enough for the average student and not paying interest or extra charges on top.
